channel.title: How to get average enqueue time from redash metadata
channel.description:
I would like to monitor a metrics: average enqueue time. I know we have column "runtime" in "query_results" but what I need is enqueue time (time between user click execute until the query is running).
Any pointer would be appreciated!
Thanks!
